```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
                      cache = TRUE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      error = FALSE)
```

```{r open_libraries}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(motus)
  library(motusData)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(here)
  library(maps)
  library(rworldmap)
  library(ggmap)
})
```

```{r set_environment}
Sys.setenv(TZ = "UTC")
```

Getting sample data, use "motus.sample" for user and password for this sample data.  If you screw it up, use `motusLogout()`.

```{r get_test_data}
proj.num <- 176
sql.motus <- tagme(projRecv = proj.num, 
                   new = FALSE, 
                   update = TRUE, 
                   dir = here("data"))
```
